ReportSection * ReportManager::createReportSection ( const std::string &  name  ) 

Create and return a new ReportSection.

Parameters:
name The name of the ReportSection to create.
Remarks:

Definition at line 35 of file ReportManager.cpp.

void ReportManager::writeReport ( const bool &  autoPurge = true  ) 

Write all ReportSections to file.

Parameters:
fileName The file name to write the report to, any existing file will be overwritten.
autoPurge If true all ReportSections will be destroyed after the writing process is finished.
Remarks:
The report will be written to "exe directory" + counter
